timeline.bodyText: I guess this should only be the case when the result from enqueuing was deferred so we did not persist a latch to track it. I wonder why the above condition on line 224 wasn't written to handle this originally. Hope we are not missing anything, been a while since I looked at this.

replies.bodyText: yeah, DEFERRED seems to be the one case this could happen. Think this is corner case when default Offheap Queue fills up.
